api_endpoint_assumption.fix: Always validate API endpoints before use
api_endpoint_assumption.prevention: Check n8n docs or test endpoint first

node_version_mismatch.fix: Use exact node names from /types/nodes.json endpoint
node_version_mismatch.prevention: Always validate node types before workflow creation

langchain_availability_assumption.pattern: Concluded LangChain nodes unavailable without proper validation
langchain_availability_assumption.fix: Proper endpoint validation revealed 103 LangChain nodes available
langchain_availability_assumption.prevention: Never assume node availability - always validate

docker_compose_compatibility.pattern: docker-compose 1.29.2 incompatible with Docker 27.5.1 causing ContainerConfig errors
docker_compose_compatibility.fix: Use direct docker commands or upgrade docker-compose
docker_compose_compatibility.prevention: Check version compatibility before container operations

custom_generator_complexity.pattern: Building complex Python generators instead of using proven community templates
custom_generator_complexity.fix: Switch to n8n community template approach
custom_generator_complexity.prevention: Research existing solutions before building from scratch

proper_api_validation.pattern: Using /types/nodes.json endpoint successfully retrieved 794 node types
proper_api_validation.replication: Always use this endpoint for node validation

template_validator_approach.pattern: Created template_validator.py that prevents node compatibility issues
template_validator_approach.replication: Use validator before every workflow deployment

langchain_discovery.pattern: Found 103 LangChain nodes available, deployed working AI agent

safe_docker_update.pattern: Successfully updated n8n 1.106.3 → 1.107.3 with data preservation
safe_docker_update.replication: Clean container state, preserve volumes, use direct docker commands

multimodal_workflow_deployment.pattern: Successfully deployed AI agent with multimodal Telegram input
multimodal_workflow_deployment.replication: Use validated nodes: telegramTrigger → code → langchain.agent → telegram

user_feedback_patterns.content: Pull node types everytime you are generating a new workflow. Validate each node every time!
user_feedback_patterns.implementation: Added template_validator.py with mandatory pre-deployment validation

user_feedback_patterns.content: Use community template approach instead of custom generators
Use ollama in local instance running, use that first, langchain comes when that cant be used
user_feedback_patterns.implementation: Prioritize local Ollama over external services

user_feedback_patterns.content: Be thorough and get on with your next tasks after validation
